title: Google\Cloud\RecommendationEngine\V1beta1\ProductCatalogItem
name: ProductCatalogItem
description:
ProductCatalogItem captures item metadata specific to retail products.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.recommendationengine.v1beta1.ProductCatalogItem

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.costs
params.description: Optional. A map to pass the costs associated with the product. For example: {"manufacturing": 45.5} The profit of selling this item is computed like so: If 'exactPrice' is provided, profit = displayPrice - sum(costs) If 'priceRange' is provided, profit = minPrice - sum(costs)

params.name: data.currency_code
params.description: Optional. Only required if the price is set. Currency code for price/costs. Use three-character ISO-4217 code.

params.name: data.stock_state
params.description: Optional. Online stock state of the catalog item. Default is IN_STOCK.

params.name: data.available_quantity
params.description: Optional. The available quantity of the item.

params.name: data.canonical_product_uri
params.description: Optional. Canonical URL directly linking to the item detail page with a length limit of 5 KiB..

params.name: data.images
params.description: Optional. Product images for the catalog item.

methods.name: getCosts
methods.description:
Optional. A map to pass the costs associated with the product.

For example: {"manufacturing": 45.5} The profit of selling this item is computed like so:

  • If 'exactPrice' is provided, profit = displayPrice - sum(costs)
  • If 'priceRange' is provided, profit = minPrice - sum(costs)

Generated from protobuf field map<string, float> costs = 3 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OPTIONAL];

  • If 'priceRange' is provided, profit = minPrice - sum(costs)

Generated from protobuf field map<string, float> costs = 3 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OPTIONAL];
